mapper.insert: INSERT INTO couple(loverAId, loverBId, isBroken, togetherTime) VALUES (#{loverAId}, #{loverBId}, false, #{togetherTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM couple WHERE (loverAId = #{loverId} or loverBId = #{loverId}) and isBroken = false ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
